prompt:
Generate a full-body, front-view portrait of character protagonist based on the following description, with a pure white background. The character should be centered in the image, occupying most of the frame. Gazing straight ahead. Standing with arms relaxed at sides. Natural expression.
Features: full-body character design, pure white background, a young Japanese man standing centrally, anime style, Japanese animation style, vibrant colors, no text / no symbols / no garbled characters / no words.

A handsome young man with an exceptionally attractive face, sharp and intelligent features. He has a pale, flawless complexion. His eyes are large, piercing, and a striking shade of light brown or amber, conveying intense focus, profound intelligence, and a hint of detached calculation. His eyebrows are well-defined and slightly arched. His nose is straight and elegant, his lips are thin and often set in a neutral or subtly contemplative expression, rarely showing overt emotion. His jawline is sharp and clean.

His hair is dark brown, styled in a neat, medium-length cut with layered bangs that sweep across his forehead, partially framing his face without obscuring his eyes. The style is modern, tidy, and slightly tousled in a deliberate way.

He wears contemporary, stylish urban clothing fitting for 2024 Tokyo. A high-quality, dark charcoal gray slim-fit blazer over a simple, crisp white dress shirt, left unbuttoned at the collar. Dark, tailored trousers. The overall look is smart, sophisticated, and understated, reflecting his high intelligence and meticulous nature rather than overt flamboyance. He carries an aura of quiet intensity, supreme confidence, and chilling charisma.

In his hand, he holds a simple, black, standard-sized notebook – the Death Note. His posture is upright and poised, emanating a sense of controlled power and god-like authority, as if weighing profound moral choices. The atmosphere is serious and psychologically tense, matching the theme of logical deduction and moral conflict., full body, standing pose, arms relaxed at sides, pure white background, character centered, no text, no symbols, no garbled characters, no words
Style: anime
No text, no symbols, no watermark, no garbled characters, no words.
